short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides ‘Foreign agents’ disclaimers from Meduza's facebook posts and from articles on their website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meduza is a Russian-language media outlet. Due to the recent changes in Russian legislation, they are now obliged by law to provide `foreign agents` disclaimers in all their articles and social media posts.

This extension will hide such disclaimers from any of Meduza's facebook posts and from articles on their website.

WARNING: this is an alpha-version, so it might lead to some unexpected results
